steps: This is an electrical component that can store electrical charge.
There are used to block direct current and allow alternating current to pass.
Let us now look at the types.
These electrolytic capacitor is the most widely used capacitor
They are in power supply circuits .

variants.steps: The ceramic capacitors are used in decoupling, filtering and timing circuits.
The film capacitor is used in voltage smoothing.
The polyester capacitor is used in audio circuits
The tantalum capacitor are used in many applications such as televion sets.
